name: place_properties
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool places.
Tool description: Over 10 million tourist attractions and facilities around the world
API description: Retrieves detailed information about a place using its unique identifier (xid) via the OpenTripMap API.

xid.description: Unique identifier of the place in OpenTripMap.

lang.description: Two-letter language code (ISO639-1). The following values are available: en (english), ru (russian)
